name: Adam
shortDescription: First man created by God in His image
storyHighlight: God formed Adam from the dust and breathed life into him

name: Eve
shortDescription: First woman, mother of all living
storyHighlight: Created from Adam's rib to be his helper and companion

name: Noah
shortDescription: Righteous man who built the ark
storyHighlight: Found favor with God and saved humanity from the flood

name: Abraham
shortDescription: Father of faith and the Hebrew nation
storyHighlight: Left his home country trusting God's promise

name: Sarah
shortDescription: Mother of Isaac, wife of Abraham
storyHighlight: Laughed at God's promise but gave birth at 90

name: Isaac
storyHighlight: Nearly sacrificed but God provided a ram

name: Jacob
storyHighlight: Wrestled with God and was renamed Israel

name: Joseph
shortDescription: Ruler of Egypt, saved his family
storyHighlight: Sold by brothers but rose to save them

name: Moses
storyHighlight: Received the Ten Commandments on Mount Sinai

name: Aaron
storyHighlight: Moses' brother and spokesman

name: Miriam
storyHighlight: Led women in praise after Red Sea crossing

name: Joshua
shortDescription: Led Israel into the Promised Land
storyHighlight: Conquered Jericho and divided the land

name: Caleb
storyHighlight: At 85 still had strength to take the land

name: Ruth
shortDescription: Moabite who became ancestor of David
storyHighlight: Loyal to Naomi, great-grandmother of David

name: Naomi
storyHighlight: Lost husband and sons but found redemption

name: Boaz
storyHighlight: Redeemed Ruth and became ancestor of Christ

name: Samuel
storyHighlight: Called by God as a child in the temple

name: Saul
storyHighlight: Tall and handsome but disobedient

name: David
storyHighlight: Shepherd boy who defeated Goliath

name: Solomon
storyHighlight: Asked for wisdom instead of riches

name: Elijah
storyHighlight: Called fire from heaven on Mount Carmel

name: Elisha
storyHighlight: Succeeded Elijah, performed many miracles

name: Isaiah
storyHighlight: Saw the Lord and prophesied of the Messiah

name: Jeremiah
storyHighlight: Called before birth to be prophet to nations

name: Daniel
storyHighlight: Survived the lions' den through faith

name: Ezekiel
storyHighlight: Saw the valley of dry bones come alive

name: Esther
storyHighlight: For such a time as this

name: Job
storyHighlight: Lost everything but never cursed God

name: Jonah
storyHighlight: Ran from God but preached to Nineveh

name: John the Baptist
storyHighlight: Prepared the way for the Lord

name: Peter
shortDescription: Apostle and leader of the church
storyHighlight: Denied Jesus but became pillar of the church

name: John the Apostle
storyHighlight: Wrote Gospel, letters, and Revelation

name: Paul
storyHighlight: Persecutor turned greatest missionary

name: Mary (Mother of Jesus)
storyHighlight: Let it be according to your word

name: Mary Magdalene
storyHighlight: Freed from demons, devoted follower

name: Martha
storyHighlight: Busy serving but learned to sit at Jesus' feet

name: Lazarus
shortDescription: Raised from the dead by Jesus
storyHighlight: Dead four days but Jesus called him out

name: Timothy
storyHighlight: Had sincere faith from grandmother

name: Barnabas
storyHighlight: Sold field and gave money to apostles

name: Stephen
storyHighlight: Saw heaven opened while being stoned

name: Philip
storyHighlight: Led by Spirit to share the Gospel

name: Cornelius
storyHighlight: Roman centurion who feared God

name: Lydia
storyHighlight: Purple cloth seller whose heart God opened

name: Priscilla
storyHighlight: Explained the way of God to Apollos

name: Aquila
storyHighlight: Partnered with Paul in ministry

name: Rahab
storyHighlight: Hid the spies and was saved

name: Deborah
storyHighlight: Led Israel to victory over Sisera

name: Gideon
shortDescription: Judge who defeated Midian with 300 men
storyHighlight: Called mighty warrior while hiding

name: Samson
storyHighlight: Lost strength through Delilah's deception

name: Hannah
storyHighlight: Prayed for a son and dedicated him to God
